title: Bitstar_coin
author: Bitstar_coin
content: As much as it is hard for me to swallow since i was not lucky enough to be among the allow list, part of me feel excited about this amazing opportunity given by the sui team to some of the sui community members.Those where lucky enough must be in cloud nine for their huge profit. And those of us who are watching from the sideline, lol, will be sad all over for missing out on this opportunity.So ladies and gents, if you are among the lucky ones, tell us if you are selling or hodlingIf you are coping like me, it is okay to air your frustration hereÂ  Lets Talk...

comments.author: Bolivar_Tony
comments.body: I participate in the farming on binance exchange and i staked 4.3 BNB to farm the token, at the end of the farming, I received just 14.4 SUI wish i got more during the farming but a lot of people took part in the process, all the same, i am happy with the free token i got, it's worth $20 as the time i am writing this post.

comments.author: ololajulo
comments.body: I find it puzzling how many projects determine the criteria for qualifying individuals for an airdrop. It appears that the sole method of eligibility for the airdrop was by participating in the Sui discord. Who could have anticipated this requirement?

comments.author: timoshani
comments.body: Quote from: Bolivar_Tony on May 03, 2023, 08:04:48 PMI participate in the farming on binance exchange and i staked 4.3 BNB to farm the token, at the end of the farming, I received just 14.4 SUI wish i got more during the farming but a lot of people took part in the process, all the same, i am happy with the free token i got, it's worth $20 as the time i am writing this post. Oh yes, I am lucky today. A contribution of 30 bucks and a profit of $1000, Today is absolutely a day sui. Moreover, it should be noted that the creators of sui reacted well to the community

comments.author: rahulzx
comments.body: No lucky chances this time, hope lucky ones fill their bag full now.

comments.author: WalkerIVIV
comments.body: Quote from: ololajulo on May 03, 2023, 08:21:35 PMI find it puzzling how many projects determine the criteria for qualifying individuals for an airdrop. It appears that the sole method of eligibility for the airdrop was by participating in the Sui discord. Who could have anticipated this requirement?that's the thing with these kind of investments, you just don't know the criteria of whitelisting same with airdrops, no one ever expected that the way you could get whitelisting is through discord, many that have tried sui in testing phase are quite disappointed, but I think most of them already got discord so they get whitelist.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Even I was not one of the lucky ones who got the allowed list in which qualified participants could get the currency at a price of $0.03 on the exchanges, which is an excellent price compared to the current price after the listing. Me, I participated in the launch pool of the Sui currency on Binance, and I was able, through my capital, to build 16.38 sui currency, and I was able to sell this amount for the equivalent of $ 27, but I preferred to hold the sui currency in the long term. The sui project is solid, and its currency is promising and attractive to investors. Therefore, the price of Sui that I see likely to reach in the coming years or months is $3-5 (just speculating), and I will not sell before it reaches that price.

comments.author: Psynthax
comments.body: massive dissapointment when I found out that I don't get allowance for investing in this coin but that's okay, maybe next time, but really lucky for the ones that got whitelisted, even those that can buy at the price of 0.03$ in which in this case they've turned it massively to humongous amounts!. i'm sure there'll also be some upcoming airdrop for sui holders in the future.

comments.author: poodle63
comments.body: Quote from: Bolivar_Tony on May 03, 2023, 08:04:48 PMI participate in the farming on binance exchange and i staked 4.3 BNB to farm the token, at the end of the farming, I received just 14.4 SUI wish i got more during the farming but a lot of people took part in the process, all the same, i am happy with the free token i got, it's worth $20 as the time i am writing this post. You should have lost more rather than what you have got from participated in the launch pool. I saw if all of small farmers in the launchpool was facing the lose rather than getting profit. It's caused by the price of BNB has been going down during the launch pool perior. You get very small amounts of money with good amounts of BNB. My friend was losing caused by he participated in launch pool.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Quote from: albon on May 03, 2023, 10:34:29 PMEven I was not one of the lucky ones who got the allowed list in which qualified participants could get the currency at a price of $0.03 on the exchanges, which is an excellent price compared to the current price after the listing. Me, I participated in the launch pool of the Sui currency on Binance, and I was able, through my capital, to build 16.38 sui currency, and I was able to sell this amount for the equivalent of $ 27, but I preferred to hold the sui currency in the long term. The sui project is solid, and its currency is promising and attractive to investors. Therefore, the price of Sui that I see likely to reach in the coming years or months is $3-5 (just speculating), and I will not sell before it reaches that price.Binance launchpad is a hard place to accumulate if you don't have a huge number of bnb to pledge, the only people who benefit most from binance launchpad are the whales.that is why i did not bother joining the launchpad because you are competing with whales who owns large amount of bnb against you with very few. the better option was from allow list but too bad not everyone was given that opportunity. yeah other opportunities are coming. Quote from: ololajulo on May 03, 2023, 08:21:35 PMI find it puzzling how many projects determine the criteria for qualifying individuals for an airdrop. It appears that the sole method of eligibility for the airdrop was by participating in the Sui discord. Who could have anticipated this requirement?Most airdrops require community engagement, nobody will reward just about anyone that does not support the community and leave out those who commit themselves to support the community.Most airdrops use discord as a criteria, the more active you are their discord the higher your chances. Reason why the level process is introduce to reward active and commited community members.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on May 03, 2023, 03:49:20 PMThose where lucky enough must be in cloud nine for their huge profit. And those of us who are watching from the sideline, lol, will be sad all over for missing out on this opportunity.There are a lot of people got frustrated with the allowlist since not all active sui community are given the chance to invest on sui. I was only lucky to get a a slot for their Kucoin exchange allowlist Pool B. But I joined the General sale but failed to secure a slot. But since Binance announced their launchpool, I was able to grab some free tokens too from it and increase my sui balance. Still holding at the moment, since a lot of itneresting projects are roaming around sui.

comments.author: woez
comments.body: Quote from: timoshani on May 03, 2023, 08:39:46 PMQuote from: Bolivar_Tony on May 03, 2023, 08:04:48 PMI participate in the farming on binance exchange and i staked 4.3 BNB to farm the token, at the end of the farming, I received just 14.4 SUI wish i got more during the farming but a lot of people took part in the process, all the same, i am happy with the free token i got, it's worth $20 as the time i am writing this post. Oh yes, I am lucky today. A contribution of 30 bucks and a profit of $1000, Today is absolutely a day sui. Moreover, it should be noted that the creators of sui reacted well to the communitySui's recent performance may be impressive but it is advisable to stay alert and stay informed about market trends and developments in the cryptocurrency industry. Yes. The creators of Sui have been responsive to the needs and concerns of their community. This kind of engagement and communication is an important aspect of building trust and credibility with investors, and can help foster a positive and supportive investment environment.Congratulations on your success with Sui!

comments.author: Rampagoe004
comments.body: I was unlucky because I couldn't invest there. Maybe it wasn't my good day. There are friends of mine who have been lucky they have had the chance to get SUI. How lucky they are. They say that they have made enough profit for now. Maybe I will get the opportunity and luck next time.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Where do you guys see this type of project? So, those that have got this token were just active in their community and did some tasks? No airdrops, right?Quote from: Rampagoe004 on May 04, 2023, 11:06:13 AMI was unlucky because I couldn't invest there. Maybe it wasn't my good day. There are friends of mine who have been lucky they have had the chance to get SUI. How lucky they are. They say that they have made enough profit for now. Maybe I will get the opportunity and luck next time.Â   I'm also afraid to invest and that's why I didn't even if I'm already seeing it that many are interested on it. But basically, those people that have been hyping it knows that this could just like a fly by night project and that's why I just ignored it.

comments.author: @sriyan
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on May 03, 2023, 03:49:20 PMAs much as it is hard for me to swallow since i was not lucky enough to be among the allow list, part of me feel excited about this amazing opportunity given by the sui team to some of the sui community members.Those where lucky enough must be in cloud nine for their huge profit. And those of us who are watching from the sideline, lol, will be sad all over for missing out on this opportunity.So ladies and gents, if you are among the lucky ones, tell us if you are selling or hodlingIf you are coping like me, it is okay to air your frustration hereÂ  Lets Talk...Yes. My grandmother and wife won the whitelisting program. I participated in OKX public sale and won the tickets. My plan is to hold until the next bull run. Also, do the mainnet tasks and try to catch the SUI second airdrop.

comments.author: bangjoe
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on May 03, 2023, 03:49:20 PMAs much as it is hard for me to swallow since i was not lucky enough to be among the allow list, part of me feel excited about this amazing opportunity given by the sui team to some of the sui community members.Those where lucky enough must be in cloud nine for their huge profit. And those of us who are watching from the sideline, lol, will be sad all over for missing out on this opportunity.So ladies and gents, if you are among the lucky ones, tell us if you are selling or hodlingIf you are coping like me, it is okay to air your frustration hereÂ  Lets Talk...I am the one who benefited from the listing of Sui on May 3, I was lucky because my account got a WL ticket at KuCoin by getting a previous WL Sui $ 0.03 ticket, it was very happy for me because in the end I got a sizable profit from Airdrop a Altcoin project as far as I am in it.1,500 Sui that I got from the max purchase of WL, and fortunately I managed to sell Sui at the price of $ 1.7 and it really surprised me to get $ 2250 by only spending $ 45.But I am a bit sad because there are many transactions for buying and selling accounts that get WL Sui tickets, those who buy accounts at the price of $ 2500, they only return their capital.l.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Quote from: @sriyan on May 05, 2023, 11:04:02 AMQuote from: Bitstar_coin on May 03, 2023, 03:49:20 PMAs much as it is hard for me to swallow since i was not lucky enough to be among the allow list, part of me feel excited about this amazing opportunity given by the sui team to some of the sui community members.Those where lucky enough must be in cloud nine for their huge profit. And those of us who are watching from the sideline, lol, will be sad all over for missing out on this opportunity.So ladies and gents, if you are among the lucky ones, tell us if you are selling or hodlingIf you are coping like me, it is okay to air your frustration here Â Lets Talk...Yes. Also, do the mainnet tasks and try to catch the SUI second airdrop.Your grandmother is supper smart to have been in the Suinetwork discord before February 2, lol. well lucky you to have been among the lucky ones to get selected. There is not going to be any second drop just so you know, plus this was not an airdrop per say just a community sale.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: I dunno when exactly but I joined Sui discord pretty early, then I got tired of their notifications and removed myself out, had also done some crew3 quests afaik. Oh well it's what it is.

comments.author: wajik-tempe
comments.body: It's logical that people who were unable to participate in the allow list would feel upset. However, it's crucial to keep in mind that there are constantly fresh investment opportunities, therefore it's crucial to exercise patience and conduct thorough study before investing in any project.

comments.author: Bobrox
comments.body: Quote from: bangjoe on May 05, 2023, 01:06:40 PMI am the one who benefited from the listing of Sui on May 3, I was lucky because my account got a WL ticket at KuCoin by getting a previous WL Sui $ 0.03 ticket, it was very happy for me because in the end I got a sizable profit from Airdrop a Altcoin project as far as I am in it.1,500 Sui that I got from the max purchase of WL, and fortunately I managed to sell Sui at the price of $ 1.7 and it really surprised me to get $ 2250 by only spending $ 45.But I am a bit sad because there are many transactions for buying and selling accounts that get WL Sui tickets, those who buy accounts at the price of $ 2500, they only return their capital.l.Its legal for selling exchange account? how its risk when account sell to the other will has chance for take back by the real owner trough email access or they will contact the costumer service from Kucoin or OKX exchange about their account hacked. I got participants in pre sale moment after qualifying with Discord account get notification as allowed for filling form joining on third exchange from OKX, Kucoin and Bybit. But miss on Bybit exchange and got two exchange for participating in pre sale on Kucoin and OKX. Have been amazing with this pre sale invested $45 and return $3,000 if sell on the early because SUI reached $2, but most people got price on $1,5 but still profitable because pre sale price on $0.03. Excited for upcoming have new pre sale and not all people can't participating without got waiting list ticket.
